long_description: With exclusive graphics only available at REI, the Arbor Cascade snowboard offers a rocker profile and enhanced nose length that are ready for your for hard-charging, powder-filled descents. Mountain rocker design offers reliable performance in deep powder, tight trees, technical steeps, carvable groomers and big backcountry kickers. Enhanced nose length offers amazing float in powder. Grip Tech sidecut creates 4 points of contact underfoot, enhancing your edge control and turns. Forest Stewardship Council certified for sustainable production, this poplar core with bamboo reinforcements along the rails is made for aggressive, big mountain riding. Bamboo topsheet acts like a third layer of fiberglass to structurally enhance the board; protective castor-bean-based bio-plastic topsheet finish. Directional twin shape; ABS/urethane blend sidewall construction; wax-infused sintered base; 60% recycled steel edges. .
short_description: With exclusive graphics only available at REI, the Arbor Cascade snowboard offers a rocker profile and enhanced nose length that are ready for your for hard-charging, powder-filled descents.
